titles: A proclamation, for suppressing of tumults in Edinburgh, and elsewhere.
author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James VII)
publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to his most sacred Majesty,
notes: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Dated: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh, the thirteenth day of December, 1688. And of Our Reign, the fourth year.
Signed: Will. Paterson, Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
keywords: Riots --  Scotland --  Edinburgh --  Early works to 1800.
